items.label: Scientists

items.label: State water management authorities
items.summary: Responsible for management of waterways including:
items.text:
• coordinating the delivery of water for the environment on the ground
  • applyiny specialist ecological and regional knowledge to monitor waterway health
  • working with local community and traditional owner groups.

items.label: Department of Agriculture and Water Resources (DAWR)
items.summary: Australian Government department responsible for the recovery of water
items.text:
Recovers water for the environment, through:

  • strategically important water purchases
  • improved water efficiency by improving on and off farm infrastructure

items.label: Environmental water holders
items.summary: The Commonwealth Environmental Water Holder (CEWH), Basin state governments and MDBA on behalf of The Living Murray program.
items.text:
• planning and delivering water for the environment
  • working with other environmental water holders to coordinate the use of water for the environment.
